text: 16:22 2 Samuel 12:11-12Ahitofel kamaghɨn mɨkemezɨma, me gumazir maba amadazɨma, me ghua atrivimɨn dɨpenir siriamɨn avughsir danganimɨn, purirpenir mamɨn ingari. Egha gumazamiziba bar, men damazimɨn Apsalom an aven ghu. Ezɨ me vaghvagha an afeziamɨn amuir doziba isa an aven zuima a me koma akui.
